name: "Triple Bear Hug" letterpress poster
description: This poster shows that you don't have to look alike to be a family. "Triple Bear Hug" was designed by the incredible Whitney Shaw. Whitney has a real knack for beautiful illustrations with a lot of character. Just a few moments looking at her other work really convinced me that she was perfect for this poster. This 16x20 letterpress poster was printed by Boxcar Press on 100% cotton Crane Lettra pearl white paper using vegetable-based inks on a Heidelberg press. Boxcar Press is 100% powered by wind. This poster carries all of the craftsmanship that Boxcar Press is known for. All major credit cards accepted. Payments are processed by PayPal, but you do not need an account with PayPal to complete your transaction. (Click the link next to "Don't have a PayPal account?")

name: "Adoption Family Tree" letterpress poster
description: This is the poster that started it all. My wife and I were looking for a family tree to display in our home that would include our children's birth parents as part of their family. We couldn't find one that we liked so we had one made. "Adoption Family Tree" was designed by an amazing artist, Dustin Harbin, who has some of the most clever and charming illustration I have ever seen. This 16x20 letterpress poster was printed by Boxcar Press on 100% cotton Crane Lettra ecru white paper using vegetable-based inks on a Heidelberg press. Boxcar Press is 100% powered by wind. This poster carries all of the craftsmanship that Boxcar Press is known for. All major credit cards accepted. Payments are processed by PayPal, but you do not need an account with PayPal to complete your transaction. (Click the link next to "Don't have a PayPal account?")

name: "In Good Company" letterpress poster
description: "In Good Company" was designed by me, Jordan Brough. I wanted to show my kids that being adopted is something of which to be proud, that some of the world's most influential people were nurtured and raised by parents other than their birth parents. This 16x20 letterpress poster was printed by Boxcar Press on 100% cotton Crane Lettra pearl white paper using vegetable-based inks on a Heidelberg press. Boxcar Press is 100% powered by wind. This poster carries all of the craftsmanship that Boxcar Press is known for. All major credit cards accepted. Payments are processed by PayPal, but you do not need an account with PayPal to complete your transaction. (Click the link next to "Don't have a PayPal account?")
